answers.answer: Hello,The restoration of toe skin depends on the medical condition causing the peeling of toe skin. It can be due to diabetes, fungal infection, allergies or skin necrosis. In some cases the skin may be restored especially if superficial layers of skin are involved but if deep layers of skin are involved then restoration of skin may not occur.I hope it helps. Take care and regards.

question: If the skin on your toes are completly off does it grow back and does it return to its natural skin tone?? PLEASE HELPP!!
title: CUT ON TOES
